name: Vice Dice (Dead Unicorn)
description:
The sinners and gluttons of Miami have indulged their vices for far too long, creatures of the dark have now arrived to drag the swine to hell where they belong. Fight back against the dark minions with spells and luck.

 

  • Dice: At the start of every turn, the game chooses 6 random dice from your dice bag, to start you have 5 normal (6 sided dice), 1 loaded die (which is always a 6), and 1 cursed die (which only rolls from 1 to 3). You can right click dice to add/remove them to your reroll. You can left click and drag dice to rearrange their order
  • Spells: Each spell does an amount of damage based on what your current dice show, the order of your dice does not matter for the sequence as long as you have the correct dice. Some spells are finite and some you have an unlimited amount.
  • Turns: On your turn you have 2 free rerolls, you can reroll as many dice as you want, after your 2 free rerolls it costs hp to reroll. Once you click a spell and successfully cast it your turn completes and you take damage from the enemy.
  • Reroll Dice: R
  • Add/Remove Die to Reroll: Left Mouse Button
  • Drag Dice: Left Mouse Button
